column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////They lose one star because our original reservation was for 7 people at 7:30.  We arrived promptly and were asked to wait.  We waited for 15 minutes
column2: and by that point our 8th guest arrived-- I told the hostess that we would be 8
column4: we had to wait another 15 minutes.  It made our 8th feel like a burden
